message: Starting review of Phase 2 Implementation - checking task context and deliverables
Examining actual deliverables - checking agents.py and phases.py for state_db migration
Found partial migration - some state_db calls exist but read_registry_with_lock still heavily used. Checking if state_db functions are implemented.
Code inspection complete. Found proper hybrid implementation with SQLite primary, JSON fallback. Testing dashboard endpoints to verify working.
Review complete. Found critical issues with Phase 2 Implementation. Preparing verdict.
Review completed. Verdict: needs_revision. Found 4 critical blockers: empty database file, schema mismatch, JSON registry still used, dashboard API failing. Phase moved to REVISING status.
